message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $125, can you meet me there?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $145?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $130, can you meet me there?
